response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. Given its significance, I believe it would also be a valuable addition to your collection or endeavors. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000, which I believe is a fair and generous offer considering its worth to both of us. Should you choose to accept this offer, it will ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. If you require more information about the product or have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
